description: A mother and her son live peacefully in their log cabin after an ambiguous nuclear holocaust - until one night.

title: Twisted Forest 3: Bloody Vengeance
description: They know when you are alone

title: The Game
description: Story is about 10 orphans, four of whom are murdered. The six survivors recount their younger days when their family of 10 was always bullied. Back then they drew a picture of how the people who bullied them would die. But the four victims are killed in the same manner as depicted in the drawings.

title: The Way of the Spur
description: Guerino, a cowboy from Italy, travels to Shanghai in search of his sister Elisa, who was working as a model in China but mysteriously vanished. In Shanghai, Guerino finds an unlikely ally in Jieikai, a local Chinese, whose girlfriend also mysteriously disappeared while working in the same modeling agency. During their search to uncover the truth, they are dragged into a dark world of criminality, corruption and human smuggling affairs. When things take a bad turn and innocent people start getting killed left and right, Guerino takes the matter into his own hands in order to save his sister before it's too late... Driven by his thirst for vengeance and his desire for justice, he vows to take down every single link to this chain of smuggling affair following his one and only rule: kick first, ask questions later.

title: Trapped in the Game
description: A bitter wife intent on wreaking revenge traps her cheating husband and his conniving mistress in a hotel suite while she skillfully orchestrates the perfect payback plan to exact upon them.

title: Typhoeus
description: Cilicia, a police detective from the Urban Police Department, assigned to the Major Crimes Unit who comes into frequent contact with the horrific murders. She becomes involved with another homicide detective, named David, who is in the mixed of a brutal slew of murders, who is believed to be one deranged killer. As the tracks come together, it leads to a demonic past with an ending filled with violent bloodshed.

title: Lighter
description: A battle between science and signs.

title: The Curse of Ball Hall II
Luna llena
description: Imagine that one day the police appear at your house and accuse you of being guilty of a series of brutal murders. You know you are innocent; your partner, your family and your friends all believe that it is an awful mistake. But, step by step, the evidence begins to pile up against you. And everyone starts to doubt you. Even yourself. You realize that there are things in your past; fears, hatreds, fatal errors that you would like to have erased. That is when you begin to ask yourself: Am I really the murderer?

title: Schizo
description: Walter Peters is a famous conspiracy theory writer for the Funston Ledger who's having a tough time coping with his mother's death.

title: Compulsion
description: An assassin's obsessive behavior puts both his mission and his own safety at serious risk.

title: Burning for Love
description: Burning For Love A suicidal teenager whose lover's requests to marry her were repeatedly rejected by her parents, is taken to the wilderness by her uncles to kill her and cleanse their tarnished honour. She tricks them and escapes their pursuit, stays the night in the bushes listening to the howling of wolves, then resumes her escape at dawn till she is found by a former Peshmerge (freedom fighter) who takes her home and treat her like his daughter. In spite the care bestowed upon her by the old Peshmerge she is still suicidal as her lover married someone else after being told she had married a relative of hers.

title: 6 Foot Rule
description: A high-tech military squadron on a mission to kill find themselves in a city with no exits.

title: Etat sauvage
description: Five friends go camping in the middle of a wild forest. Everything seems to be going well, they drink, take drugs and have fun like teenagers. They're filming to capture every moment of that famous weekend. When one night, one of them mysteriously disappears, without losing a second everyone goes looking for him and the little holiday movie will quickly change into a spectacular testimony.

title: Cruens Winter
description: It came, It saw, It killed

title: Cosmos Bank Chinese James Bond Style Television Commercial
Mesawar Qateel
description: Ahmed Sakr is one of the best news photographers in Egypt, he always puts himself in the right place while the most dangerous events happen, his wife got killed while she was with him and no body knows the killer, he goes on a journey to know the killer until he finds an antique camera that changes the course of the events, the camera doesn't just shoot the present, it shoots the past... or maybe the future?

title: Spin
description: Five strangers enlist in a deadly high stakes game in an attempt to free themselves from debt.

title: The Chronicles of an American Vigilante
description: A wild run from the law leaves a family in shambles. Time will tell if a man will choose the safety of his family or to save himself. As a man robs a bank he lays low at a families home with them unknowing of the situation. Each day that passes puts his family more in danger. Will he leave everything he's ever known behind or will he try a new escape plan.

title: Writer's Block
description: Well known crime author EDGAR ROSS gets his latest book rejected by his Publication. In addition, he's told to stop writing about his two most beloved characters. Mounting pressure from a new, fast arriving deadline, pushes EDGAR to the edge of his wits, and sanity. Reality blurs with the pages of the typewriter and leads Edgar to places he never imagined.

title: Suspection of Annoyance
description: Detective Dean Thomas has been on the case of the Tyrone Killer for three years. When a new lead opens, he is forced to partner with an annoying victim.

title: Solipsa
description: On her tenth anniversary a working mother & wife has the worst day of her life & attempts to survive at all costs. In her small town the day after the Fourth of July Parade a topical zombie infection spreads through the tight knit community of Ashland Oregon. Because of the six to twelve hour incubation period where no symptoms exhibit themselves no one knows who's infected. By the time they do it's too late...

title: The Diary of Alice Applebe
description: A Psychology graduate struggles with the depth of his first case involving a young woman suffering with depression.

title: Ghost Walk: The Farm
description: Multi award-winning film; including 2 BEST FILM trophies. Johnny comes home on Army leave to marry his fiance Estella. Strange and terrifying events trap the young couple on their honeymoon in a living nightmare.

title: The Cult
description: This philosophical, paranormal thriller is a timely and relevant exploration in spirituality and religion. Ten people attend a séance that will change their lives... and yours..

title: Big Nova Gold
description: 'All the best poems are written in blood' is the notion documented in this phantasmagorical study of a down-and-out word master coming to grips with his demons. Hallucination supplants reality as he journeys through memory, guilt and paranoia to an ironic and lyrical summation of his artistic and existential posturings-- 'where am I and who are you?'

title: Time Off
description: An out of job man accidentally creates a time machine.

title: Awesome Killer Audition
description: A movie audition goes horribly wrong.

title: Running on Empty
description: When you are at the top, there is no way to go but down.

title: Chronique d'un Affranchi
description: The true family of Frank Di Angelo is from underworld. His gang is made up a rough group of headstrong men. Mistakes, debts and treasons have unavoidably brought them face to face with Andrei Milhov, member of the Russian Mafia.

title: Unsound Innocence
description: There is a police investigation in a case where mentally challenged young women disappeared in suspicious circumstances. Mike Charlton, a young ambitious detective, gets to interrogate the main suspect, a well-known psychologist doctor. His instinct says solving the case is a piece of cake, but the suspect is either innocent or too smart to get caught. The interrogation turns into a cat and mouse game where the cop has to use up all of his assets from bluffs to lies, from patience to violence until the surprising, shocking and disturbing end.

title: Beneath the Darkness: Behind the Scenes Dvd-extra
Backtrack 2.0
description: A young, innocent woman wakes up to find she has no memory of how she came to be tied up in a dark, damp store room. After escaping and being hunted down by a masked man, her world is literally turned upside down, as she experiences the living hell of what follows - in reverse!

title: Village Creek Road
description: A news team is investigating the supposed disappearance of five local teenagers. The search for their whereabouts begins on the two year anniversary of "The Missing Five" disappearance. The news team quickly learns that their search for the five has deadly consequences as they find more than they ever wanted. A desperate fight for survival in the woods of Village Creek begins.

title: The Autobiography of Jesus in America
description: Jesus takes a wizard of Oz journey through the states of America to restore peace and morals back in America.

title: Simple Things
description: A hitman is set on a crash course with an innocent woman after running afoul of a feared London crime boss.

title: The Artist Within
description: The artist's psyche pushes the actor to the edge so that he loses his identity.

title: Sardonic Smile
description: Grazia, sister of student of archeology Isabella, is missing. The German police is not of great help and thus Isabella follows the only trace she has: to Sardinia. There she actually finds her sister in the camp of a mysterious escapist, amidst ancient sagas and unsettling crimes. And in the end it's Isabella who gets trapped in the clutches of a precarious past.

title: Aporanya
description: Aporanya is the name of a quantum videogame console created by game designer Astrid. The machine was designed to recreate a parallel reality, for exclusive use in games. The result is terrible.

title: Dig Your Own Grave
description: A blackly comic recession-hit crime thriller. Bob Bass, a hit-man with a bad back, gives his latest victim the chance to live a little longer -by digging his own grave deep in the woods. Big-hearted Bob takes pity on crooked accountant Sammy Smith - who's bent on outliving everyone so he can enjoy the loot he embezzled from Bob's Boss. Cut-backs in the underworld see The Boss dispatch a gang of ruthless freelancers to sort out a tangled low-budget plot that recalls the off-beat B&W heyday of the British B-movie. As Bob's colleagues circle like vultures, an innocent family and their dog wander into the crossfire - and a simple job turns into a bloody nightmare.

title: Red Rover
description: Red Rover follows Detective Travis Greene through a world of turmoil and chaos when a serial killer turns Austin, Texas into his playground.

title: Days of Infection
description: After an unknown virus spreads throughout the country, the decision is made to evacuate Great Britain. Unfortunately, many were too late.

title: A Shallow Grave
description: A young man receives a letter claiming that his deceased father is still alive and stops at nothing to find out the truth.

title: The Nameless Cross
description: The last thing he fought was a Tiger... A mysterious underground video 'Tiger vs. Human' Dark fate creeps upon a man who started to seek the urban-legend video. Does this tape exist? Can he survive through dangerous missions? The person who holds the key to everything is a man without a name and the past...

title: Sueño
description: SUEÑO es un largometraje perteneciente al género thriller de acción, donde Carlos sufre una enfermedad denominada Insomnio letal familiar provocando un deterioro degenerativo de su cuerpo y su mente. A Carlos le proponen desde la administración una cura alternativa de su enfermedad y esto le llevará a vivir una historia llena de engaños, intereses farmacéuticos y políticos, así como un intenso debate entre la vida y la muerte. El instinto hará posible que todo se destape. Sin sueño no hay vida. Duermes despierto pero no hay descanso. El instinto es lo único que me mantienen vivo. Estas son las tres frases que resumen la esencia de esta apasionante y trepidante historia. SUEÑO es la ópera prima de Joaquín Ortega (actor y especialista de cine español) y es un largometraje subvencionado por su productora NOIDENTITY Films de manera privada.

title: Slender
description: Garrett 'Slender' Bender is an 11-year-old boy obsessed with books, movies and toys involving monsters. But when he witnesses his friend Robbie being attacked by a real monster in the woods, he is faced with a dilemma; Slender wants to return with a camera, but his friend is hesitant to agree. When Robbie refuses to accompany him back to the woods, Slender cannot resist going back alone.

title: Frequency
description: Distraction is about the strange disappearance, and even stranger re-appearance of small town belle Claire. The story follows her star-crossed friend Wesley as he tries to solve the mystery of where she's been and why other strange things have been happening in town when she reappears.

title: Second Hand
description: Jorge is a lonely writer of popular fiction. At night, he looks through lighted up windows at people in their homes and thinks, yes, they are happy. One day, chance, he thinks, takes him to the house where Laura lives with her son André, and through the big windows, Jorge discovers the picture of a perfect life. But perfect lives are only perfect when you view them from the outside. If you look closely, nothing is as it seems: Laura's previous husband disappeared mysteriously and strange phone calls disturb the serene Laura. This doesn't scare Jorge. He wants to protect her. He invents the perfect man for Laura, a man for her to love and in that way enters that wonderful world that he thinks he knows.

title: Tracy
description: A Girls Temptations Come out in the middle of the day in a full incarnation.

title: The Devil's Grave
description: A woman and her lover frantically bury the body of her husband in the backyard, only to discover a corpse already buried there. Shoveling further, the mystery deepens as more creepy remains are uncovered until the ghastly source of this ancient evil is finally unearthed.

title: Behind the Scenes of the Sony 'Skyfall' Bond Phone Has Arrived Television Commercial
Undercurrent
description: A skilled young hit man is new in town and hooks up with a prominent local crime family. Trusted with his first hit, things go decidedly off-course when he discovers his target was hiding much darker secrets than Ray was prepared for.

title: Vamps, Blood & Smoking Guns
description: A hard-boiled female detective has to solve a murder plot orchestrated by vampires.
A story about healing love in shattered circumstances.

title: Broken
description: A day in the life of a young woman who's marriage to a passionate young man is steadily deteriorating when all of his lies and love affairs catch up to the couple.

title: Wanda
description: Wanda is preparing an anniversary dinner for her boyfriend, whom she has never met in person until now.

title: Underneath: A verse of the macabre
description: Middle-aged man wakes up from a terrible nightmare, only to reflect on his own reality. Six months earlier, after the death of his Mother. Him and his Wife move into her dilapidated home which once belonged to his Grandfather. Renovations begin and almost immediately he begins to find relics hidden throughout the house, a WWII trunk hidden deep inside an eerie hole down in the dingy basement. Inside the trunk he not only finds a morbid truth from his Grandfather's own words, but wrapped cloaked in black velvet with a red ribbon cross hides something he nor his Wife is ready to find...A Ouija board. Things begin to get interesting once he finds himself obsessing to talk to the dead, something his Wife wont stand for whatsoever...

title: Coca-Cola Unlock the 007 in You in 70 Seconds
originalTitle: Unlock the 007 in You in 70 Seconds

title: Dark of Winter
description: An assassin tries to comprehend the otherworldly events that begin to happen to him in the middle of a complex job.

title: Ukradennoe zhelanie
description: 'The Stolen Wish' is a mesmerizing thriller based on real events - a horrific suicide bombing that took dozens of young lives and forced the author to look differently upon fate - it's the surreal nature of this feature length movie that best reflects reality.

title: The Complete Bob Wilkins Creature Features
description: "The Complete Bob Wilkins Creature Features" - From 1966 to 1981 Over 1,200 Shows and 1,800 Movies. Each and every one covered in this film, take a trip through 16 years across 3 stations of Bob Wilkins' wit and of course the horror films.

title: Willful Blindness
description: WILLFUL BLINDNESS is a mesmerizing story of a man as he crawls home after being shot, a story of a mother supporting her daughter and a story of a daughter who has been a passive recipient of the fruits of evil. On the films surface, the man reflects on what has brought him to this moment and to his relationships, on a deeper level, the film questions the materialistic, imperialistic and self-centered values of our time.

title: Ties
description: After the tragic death of Lauren Willis, Peter, her husband is left disturbed. Whilst grieving he stumbles across curious pieces of information that point to a more sinister motive behind her death. In an attempt to find more answers Peter confronts Nelson Howard a high profile family lawyer who is connected to Lauren through undisclosed means. Ties is a commentary and investigation into the human condition and the way everyone is ultimately bound together.

title: A Lonely Man
description: Water, water everywhere, but not a drop to drink. In this sea of humanity we sometimes forget that we don't really have any human connection. We avoid eye contact, plug our ears to the sounds and recoil at the touch of another human being. But isn't touch a basic human need? Why does someone desperate for it seem creepy? We all know him. The guy who tries too hard. The leech. The odd ball. The one we make excuses and run away from. But maybe, just maybe, he's not a weirdo. Maybe he's just lonely. Lonely Man is a look at the day of such a man. His pathetic attempts at connecting with his work mates, associates, hell, even the man on the street. Seeing quick highlights from his day we get clues of what he's going through. And perhaps understand the shocking path he's taken up.

title: Second Sight
description: The film portrays the story of Aaron Hawkins, an orderly at a facility for the mentally ill, who takes drastic measures to regain control of his life. He discovers a life-changing book and begins affecting the lives of those around him in dangerous ways.

title: Heineken 'Skyfall' Limited Edition STR Bottle Television Commercial
originalTitle: The Limited Edition Heineken STR Bottle

title: The Corpse Grinders 3
description: Lotus Cat Food is under new management and this time they have improved the recipe even more.

title: The Bridgewater Murders
description: Isabelle Bridgewater was a beautiful, warm, and caring woman in a loving marriage. Until a moment of jealousy turned into a brutal act of rage. When she discovers that her husband, John, is having an affair with her best friend, Isabelle goes on a blood soaked rampage of hate. Gayle Fleming must unlock the secrets behind Isabelle's madness before she kills again.

title: The Holloway Story
description: Shelton Jerome Holloway, a mentally challenged man surgically removed organs.

title: Rock Bottom Creek
description: When a stressed couple decide that a weekend road trip could revive their battered courtship, an unpredictable series of luckless mishaps turn a reserved town into a personal hell.

title: Katie55
description: Who is the real Katie55? Is she a bored college student stuck in a hum-drum town, or a fifteen-year-old girl whose video journal has thousands of followers hits online? Even Katie isn't sure anymore. She thought it was innocent at first: If you only have one life, why not live two? Except it's no longer that simple. Katie must question her reality when elements from her fictional life start bleeding into her real one. Katie55 is a feature-length psychological thriller for the Facebook generation that asks: are we really who we think we are?

title: Paper Man
description: Paper man is now marrried and has kids

title: Brother
description: A man living in a small Midwestern town believes he is being spied upon by someone, or something. As he digs deeper into his situation, he finds a secret that will change his life forever.

title: Great Rescue
description: In 1932, as Korea is occupied by Japan, Chu Fucheng, an important figure in the city of Jiaxing, China, is asked to help in hiding exiled Korean nationalist Kim Gu.

title: Lily Rose
description: A young studious man, Jake, goes about his daily life, never straying from his usual day to day routine. One day he meets the the girl who would later change his life, Lily Rose. From first sight Jake realizes there is something special about Lily, but because of his shy personality chooses not to approach her. One day they run into each other and Jake feels compelled to stray from his routine and disregard his shyness in an effort to find out more about her. As a result, more than just a friendship begins to form. Despite Lily's warnings to Jake that she is not looking for a serious relationship, they both begin to fall in love. Both of them grow closer and closer until one day, it all goes wrong. Jake goes weeks without hearing from Lily, leaving him lonely and distraught. It is then that he is confronted with the news that forever changed his life.

title: Shooting Goldman
description: About a reality-TV host who begins to suspect that he's unknowingly the subject of a reality show.

title: El eterno retorno
description: A group of students get lost in a zone where they can't escape, because crossing an invisible limit push them to go back. They survive several days, someone seems to have planned everything.

title: Shadow
description: A psychological thriller about a kid who goes for a bike ride.

title: Pub Crawl
description: It's a movie about a Pub Crawl in Edinburgh, Scotland. It takes place in a one day period on the day of the Grand National. Old friends relive the days and memories of their youth.

title: Killer Instinct
description: Returning home after a few years away, Jake Antwiller decides to go see his mates. On the way home, he helps a woman out in a mugging. Before you know it, shes dead and the mugger has run off. but is staying with Jake's best friend.

title: Desert Road Kill
description: One in seven hitchhikers is potentially dangerous. A family on their way home from an outing pick up a hitchhiker with surprising results.

title: The Doomsloop
description: Accused of foul play in the accidental deaths of his former girlfriends, Internet sensation, Brick Maison uses his roommate's camera phone, audition tapes and personal documentary footage to produce a vindicating film. Haunted by all of his past transgressions, Brick meets and falls in love with his true soul mate, Karma and is forced to make some life changing decisions.

title: Gold Man
description: The story of a gold man. A human statue that remains stationary for money. Day in and Day out he performs this task, standing perfectly still to entertaining curious onlookers. Who is the gold man, and is he really as harmless as he appears to be?

title: 151 Kent Ave
description: This is a remarkable feature film not least of all because it was written, shot and edited in 48 hours. With its naturalistic style and controversial content, it might remind you of Lars von Trier and the Dogme 95 films that he is renowned for. When the doorbell rings through the airy loft of 151 Kent Avenue, there's no-one there... but the first anonymous postcard slides under the door. As supernatural forces begin to haunt the lives of residents at 151 Kent Avenue, we explore the depths of trust in a traumatic onscreen relationship between mates Cam and Jake -two Australians who lean on each other after moving to New York City. With tensions rising we discover some hard truths about both characters that is truly 'hard-to-watch' content. Can they both fight their inner demons while under a supernatural assault?

title: Denounced
description: When a ruthless hit-man is 'denounced' from the mafia, his old enemies declare war.

title: The Losing Hand
description: They lost everything... but they will fight to the end.

title: Edward's Julia
description: Edward is haunted by his dead girlfriend, Julia, in this psycho-thriller.

title: The Local's Bite
description: For a young woman in Telluride, Colorado, a gondola ride is a routine way to travel home after a night at the bars. However, her walk turns to a run when a stranger decides to follow her. His motive proves to be sinister as it becomes obvious he intends to trap her in the gondola cabin, alone. The problem: he may just get what he wants.

title: Paperthin
description: When someone is murdered in cold blood on his doorstep, a talented yet exhausting recluse (Tommy) hires a washed-up former detective with an agonizing past (Dobbs) to help uncover a mystery that runs much deeper than either could have possibly imagined. As the unlikely duo begin to unravel a wide-spread corruption, with powerful authorities hot in pursuit, the truths of Dobbs' sordid past begin to resurface. Faced with his personal demons and imminent danger to everyone he loves, Dobbs must choose whether to risk everything -his family, his friends, and himself- for his past, his honor, and his undying duty to the shield.

title: The Eyes of Jukai
description: Video blogger Stephen McKinney has been traveling across Japan in search of haunted places for thrills and excitement. For his next trip, Stephen travels to the infamous Jukai - the 'cursed' suicide forest at the base of Mt. Fuji. He soon discovers a series of security cameras placed in the forest, along with abandoned tents and strange footprints. What begins as a fun adventure, soon becomes a race against time. Stephen must now uncover the mystery behind these items, before he too suffers the same unknown fate. This film is presented through a collection of found footage; including the enigmatic security cameras - the eyes of Jukai.

title: Kept
description: A Young couple are tormented by an unknown presence that threatens to destroy them.

title: Kunduz: The Incident at Hadji Ghafur
description: A German-afghan photographer witnesses the air-strike on two petrol trucks near Kunduz in September 2009. Heavily wounded he boards a plane that shall bring him out of Afghanistan. As the crew and a traveling doctor fight for his life he tells the true story of this fatal incident.

title: Sal Munir
description: Six people go missing, after making a fun bet that turns into a horrific dead end, when they decide to go into the woods.

title: Waterfront Nightmare
description: Seven college friends spend their spring break in a remote waterfront cabin only to discover that their lives are in jeopardy.

title: Futures Past
description: A move of past evidence to a new location seems to pass without hitch - but has it? Items are missing and who are the sinister men in black, housed in the white building with no windows. Could the mysterious death of a child years ago be linked to new tragedies or are they more in keeping with ancient crimes. What of the fallen detective and the man constantly haunting him. Is it for real or is it just in his memories?

title: Material Support
description: Two suspected terrorists struggle to survive their extreme rendition to the open desert.

title: Wraith
description: A supernatural drama telling the story of Darren Jackson, a kitchen salesman bored with his mundane life. So when the opportunity arises for him to change his destiny, Darren grabs it with both hands. His mentor of sorts, Fetch, teaches Darren how to 'wraith'; to send his spirit into other's bodies and control them for a short time. However, when Darren's body is left without a spirit, it is taken over by someone else, and it is Darren's challenge to reclaim his body, and his life.

title: Presumed Dead
description: A wealthy businessman dies, and everyone wants a piece of his estate.

title: Bell
description: A man buries a plague stricken women. To assure that she is dead, he has attached a bell to her. So the question becomes, If the bell rings, should he dig her up or let her die at the insistence of his wife?

title: No Remorse
description: A notorious drug cartel ventures off into the wilderness for a weekend of fun and partying. Little did they know that their demons from the past would come back to haunt them! Members of the cartel are dying off one by one by someone or something on their weekend getaway. The night grows darker and the screams grow louder. Who and will anyone make it out alive, and a what cost?

title: Unknowing
description: An unwanted photo, a suspicious message...... is someone watching?

title: Patapalo
description: A defiant young boy challenges a ghostly legend by disobeying his mother.

title: Prison Sewer
description: A girl is trapped inside a narrow sewer.

title: My Best Frenemy
description: Sex, money and power come between two lifelong friends.

title: Rid
description: RID -- A troubled young woman steals the identity of a nurse and tries to care for a comatose patient in a Gothic mansion. Upon arrival she seems to be attacked at night by fleas. Even more strange is that the repellent and sprays she is using to fight the infestation seem to bring the patient whom she is developing an infatuation with slowly out of his stupor. Rid is a creepy, sexy, mind-game that will have the audience scratching there arms and and wiggling in their seat.

title: Confrontation
description: The film is build upon a couple telling the backdrop story of their friends who got raped from a party, one month ago.

title: Skinner's Cabin
description: Travelers are killed by crazed hillbillies.

title: Scartape
description: The cult classic Scarface depicts a Cuban ex-con immigrant traveling to the United States in search of his idea of the American dream. My film is a parody of Brian De Palma's Scarface -'Tony MontageAna' is a frustrated and bitter video producer looking for work in the freelance market and is struggling due to the bad economy. He settles as a production assistant for a TV studio in New York and is determined to rise to power.

title: Downstream
description: A traumatized college student is obsessed with using lucid dreams in order to uncover a repressed memory. Through his journey down the stream of his own subconscious, reality and dreams not only begin to blur - they collide.

title: Blown
description: After getting fired from his job, fireworks expert, Terrance Nathan Thatcher returns to his childhood home. When people and memories from his past re-emerge, Terrance becomes dangerous and vengeful.

title: Here is the End of the World
description: After her brother's death, Golrokh decides to go to séance classes to connect with her brother!By this process other ghosts' Harassments begins.

title: Skyfall Videoblog: Naomie Harris and Bérénice Marlohe
Downpour
description: Trapped in a crumbling cellar with a world above them on fire, two almost-strangers struggle to maintain a grip on the hellish reality they now face. Both must come to terms with their fate in their own way, but how safe are they from themselves? Humanity versus depravity, acts of kindness versus acts of cruelty. Downpour explores what makes us human.

title: InBetween
description: A severely disturbed teenager obsessed by the topic of murder comes across a theory in Psychology stating there are only Five types of murder in existence. To disprove this, he decides on murdering his best friend. Unlike every other film with the topic of murder and teenagers, we aren't trying to find out who the killer is or who will die next- we know who dies and who kills them within the films first few minutes. The goal of this film was to take a different approach and ask... Why? Why do killers kill, and what effects does murder have on those closest to the victim?

title: ComputerWorld
description: 'ComputerWorld' is a science fiction dystopia set primarily in the corporate offices of the software/hardware conglomerate Computerica. Technology has been refined so that people communicate through digital telepathy and a string of code can take a life. All aspects of society are part of the perpetuation of Computerworld. But when one worker discovers a mysterious error in his data reports, it sets him onto a conspiracy of murder and corporate intrigue.

title: Equilibrium
description: Felix is a murder mystery writer that has trouble separating reality from fantasy. Both he and Kate are persuaded to meet each other at a social gathering in a cabin in the woods. After some bizarre introductions the situation becomes gruesome. In their efforts to escape Felix and Kate discover the circumstances are more than what they first perceived. As they peel back the layers they discover that murder, in a manner of speaking, may be comical, romantic and justified.

title: Nue Naku Karudera
description: Chiaki returned to her home town Nuegabuchi, a hot springs village, upon hearing that her mother Yoshiko will be closing down her inn.

title: A Creeping Fear
description: An attorney's wife images the worst case scenario after hearing of the escape of serial killer Ebenezer Cain. The thoughts keeping creeping into the mind of an attorney that potential could be assigned the case. Are the thought in his mind or real?

title: Ambitious
description: Had Lil' Dirty and his crew of thugs known before hand that they would all be morgue bound one day after 'the lick' they might have stayed in school.

title: Devil and the Nail
description: An insomniac American doctor, working in India, discovers that his recurring nightmare is becoming reality.

title: The Desolate
description: A young man, Devon, is released from a mental institution after spending a few months there, only to find out everything is not what it seems. Devon must struggle with real life with the 'help' of Dr. Everdeem.

title: Qualia
description: A team of scientists is conducting an experiment to detect the soul, when one of them starts to see a ghost causing a crisis of faith.

title: The Desperate Tale of Ralph
description: When Ralph arrives home to find his estranged brother dead in his apartment, Ralph begins an investigation into what caused it.

title: The Awakened
description: Five friends decide to weather out a hurricane in Miami. But when drinking gets old, the party games get strange, and people begin to die. Is what is inside the house more terrifying than the storm raging outside?

title: Through the Eyes
description: Through The Eyes is a mockumentary about what the smell in Carrollton, GA is. It follows a news reporter learning what is happening to the small town. He soon figures out the problem is a lot larger than what he expected. He then, has to figure out what he is going to do with his life.

title: Seeking the Dead
description: When your heart is pure no action is evil.

title: Second Thoughts
description: A young man prepares to propose to his girlfriend as the couple dines in an elegant restaurant, just as the moment of truth approaches the restaurant starts to conspire against him in a last second representation of all his doubts about marriage.

title: Evil Gang
description: A private detective lost his own older sister due to a rape episode. The detective works daily while searching for the three criminals who murdered his sister. An old couple approach him one day. They have lost their son due to a murder. The killer was sent to jail, but is now released. The couple are looking for the freed murderer and also wondering regarding forgiveness.

title: Hoodrush
description: Hoodrush tells a story of the challenges encountered by two brothers who strive to partake in musical talent shows.

title: The Abstracting
description: When passion turns into obsession, one succumbs to their dark desires. Brian, a disturbed artist, lures his friends out to a haunted mansion for a weekend of creation and madness, relentlessly perusing his true love. Will he get what he wants or will his dark desires overtake him?

title: Huellas
description: The Ivan's psyche is affected when he becomes the lover of a young married woman.

title: Shou zhu ren
description: A mistake Jiajia made 8 years ago caused her grandmother's death. 8 years passed and this mistake still haunts her and caused her to stuck between reality and imaginations.

title: Alexandria
description: After the abortion of an unplanned pregnancy, Alexandria (Elyse Dufour) and husband Martin (Brent Bauer) undergo a trying time in their marriage. Suffering from years of psychological struggles, Alexandria finds her daily regimen of anti-psychotics failing to stem the hallucinations and destructive behavior. The passage of time leads Alexandria to believe that she is either being mentally and emotionally tortured by Martin or she is being haunted by the ghost of her unborn child. The mounting tension and fear break her fragile psyche forcing her to face the fallout of her decisions.

title: Camp Butchinson
description: We've all had times in our lives where we felt we weren't quite butch enough. For truly hopeless cases, there's only one place left to go: Camp Butchinson. Camp Butchinson is a brutal place, run by sadistically macho counselors who don't hesitate to use force with the campers. Eventually, the campers band together to overpower the counselors and call our their ideas about butchness as misogynist and gender-binary driven in an over-the-top display of gruesomeness and faggotry.

title: Myth Seekers: In Search of Il Brutto
The Call of Farqunglu
description: An H.P. Lovecraft parody shot using stop motion animation. In Arkham, MA, the Cult of Farqunglu gathers to unleash an ancient evil onto the world. A group of plucky investigators fight to stop them. But even if they win, will they be prepared to face the wrath of civil litigation? The answer will be revealed... When the stars are right...

title: Silent Change
description: In a rural area in northeast Arkansas, a quiet 14-year-old boy named Anthony accidentally eavesdrops on a conversation from two local boys that he wasn't supposed to hear. His friend Bobby begins to suspect something wrong and sets out to find answers. But he may put himself and Anthony into danger.

title: Fucked Up: The Complete Story
description: Kane finds out that his partner is cheating on him and he doesn't take it too well.

title: Juk-ji-a-na
description: Jihun became a farmer 4 years ago because of his grandfather's money. His grandfather is getting younger, and his hope is turned to despair.

title: Blood Trail
description: Blood Trail (2012) is a hand-drawn animation which took over two years to complete. With the exception of some of the acting, Emerson Frakes was the sole creator of the film, from drawing, to editing, to the music. The process of creating the film could be compared to creating a work of art for the reasons that the creator had full control over the production, something that rarely occurs in movie making. In the age of 3D animation, Blood Trail reverts back to the roots of animation by using a hand-drawn technique which gives the viewer a unique cinematic experience. The technical aspects of the animation add a comical element that parallel the dark humor found in the story.

title: They're Coming
description: At 10:03am on March 20, 2012 Amanda York is reported missing. Her husband receives a mysterious note from an old friend that says "They're Coming".

title: Bark
description: A lone hiker attempts to document an increasingly menacing phenomenon in this taut thriller.

title: Promenade: Volume 1 Love in the Elevator
description: A man is hired by a high tech company and falls in love in the elevator with a woman that appears in his dreams.

title: Catch Hell
description: Owen, a family man turned bank robber, picks up a lone hitchhiker as a hostage. But as the hitchhiker reveals himself to be more than first meets the eye, Owens best laid plans begin to spiral out of control.

title: London Latino
description: A Venezuelan model, a Brazilian singer and a Bolivian rapper struggle against the odds to make it in one of the biggest, toughest cities in the world - London.

title: La Sierva
description: A Mexican, undocumented housekeeper must fight for survival when she steals from a drug cartel.

title: Hamlet Unbound
description: Hamlet meets his stepfather's ghost, who claims hewas murdered. The phantom demands vengeance. Hamlet feigns madness and ends his amorous liaison with Ophelia, his shrink, in order to achieve its end.

title: Two Suspects
description: Ryan Black investigates the dark details of a dead woman he discovered in his bathtub.

title: Henryk
description: Young police officer Julian Grey has returned to Hoquiam - his nautical, dumpy hometown, to help his childhood friend Don cope with the disappearance of his fiance, Wendy. The investigation was closed some months back, and is now labeled a 'cold case.' Upon arriving into town, Julian immediately sees peculiarities in the investigation - mainly that the local police reports omit the identity of the only man considered a suspect in the case. This man, Trent Reynolds, reveals that although he knew Wendy very little, he noticed a Paganistic scar on her arm shortly before her disappearance. This, among other clues, leads Julian to conduct research into Hoquiam's history. In doing so, he learns of an old urban legend about a Satanic cult that would abduct and sacrifice the townspeople - 'The Golden Order of the Cross.' Julian learns that not only does this cult still practice, but that its ability to control and brainwash its members proves as dangerous and deadly as the ritualistic sacrifices themselves. Risking his life and sanity, it becomes Julian's mission to infiltrate the secret cult in order to rescue Wendy, and compile enough evidence on them to initialize a police-raid.

title: Home Entertainment
description: A newlywed couple is taunted in their home by an unknown stalker.

title: Cognition
description: A wealthy late twenties socialite is forced to take a psych exam in order to take over his late father's hundred million dollar corporation. But when the therapist goes missing all will unveil itself.

title: Yusei Megadolce
description: When Karin starts working part-time for space physicist Professor Utsunomiya, she begins to see a planet exactly like the Earth in the sky above her. This planet called Megadolce seems to be getting closer day by day. While Karin suspects this phenomenon may have something to do with the subject of research of the now missing professor, she finds herself getting accosted by more and more strange person as. Karin heads for Megadolce to solve the problem, and waiting for her there is.

title: The Attic
description: Joseph Parker is pulled into a horrific series of events when his best friend is killed at the hands of a malevolent ghost. He tries to explore The Ghost's origins and motives, but these actions only land him in greater danger.

title: A Few Quiet Men
description: A couple of sketches set around the organized crime and they violent meetings.

title: Sunog
description: A detective tries to solve a murder without a trace of evidence and witnesses who suspects the supernatural.

title: Common Ground
description: Dennis' musician brother Oli is missing. And Dennis is not the only person looking for him. Oli's ex-wife, the members of his band and the local moneylenders are all on the lookout for Oli too. And tramps have moved into Oli's flat. With Oli nowhere to be found, Dennis inherits a whole set of problems that threaten both him and his family... Set against the backdrop of the contemporary economic crisis and the anti-government protests of late 2011, Common Ground is a neonoir film about family, identity, economics and the dream of utopia.

title: The Wolf
description: This story focuses on a conflicted young man (Travis Wolf) who struggles with his freedom after witnessing his girlfriend overdose on drugs she found in his jacket pocket. On the run and desperate to survive, he makes one bad decision after another that leads to his ultimate demise.

title: Last Heart
description: Breath of life I'm coming home A film about death, love and freedom.

title: Journal of an Epidemic
description: What if there was an outbreak?

title: Last Days In Waldo County
description: Independent narrative/pseudo-documentary shot in Waldo County, Maine, between the years 2010 and 2012. An experiment in white trash excess and violence.

title: Do You Want to Play?
description: A haunted playground in the Chicago area and a modern look at the vampire genre. A girl waits on the swings for her boyfriend to show up unaware of what is watching her or where it comes from. Inspired in part by the works of Stephen King and H.P. Lovecraft.

title: Sr Blanc
description: Through a mix-up, a man involuntarily enters into a web of secrets and espionage that will change his life forever. Wrapped up in crazy situations, he will try to get back to normal.

title: Selitra No. 7
description: An unusual disc containing a video with a secret code turns up the Bureau of Investigations. Special Agent Bonepard Grab summons an ordinary journalist Petr Sanchik to show him the contents of the disc. In the video the journalist is killed by something extraordinary and inexplicable - Selitra Number 7.

title: Regression Post Panic Film
description: 2029, the Earth is about to suffer the ultimate consequence of climate change that will succumb to its demise. The last hope of humanity lies in the Saturn's largest moon, Titan, the only place in the solar system with copious amounts of fluid resting on its surface. Only genetically perfect can be instructed to colonize Titan and thus save the human race. Under the supervision of central government, is created REGRESSION, a program, through the hippo campus, it links the perfect individual to a past life. That caused more pain. A.- The dolmen of those killed in the last century hidden sighs X. B. The violent unreasoned-speaking brothers and customs in the Spanish Civil War. C-The collective ecstasy in an unusual and macabre dance-club-eighties.

title: Stenwyken
description: Meet Samantha, she's having problems. So, she goes camping to 'clear her head' and walks right into the source of all her issues, and they are some BIG HAIRY issues.

title: This Spying Life
description: College spy agencies fight for state funding, athletic success, and prestige.

title: Old Traditions
description: This crime anthology chronicles the assassinations carried out by a ritualistic hit man. He is known only as The Milkman.

title: Strangers
description: A late-night contract murder, carried out with methodical ferocity, is followed by a kidnapping, and these violent but silently accomplished acts set the tone for an atmospheric neo-noir set in LA. The dead man's girlfriend turns out to be the hitman's new assignment, but an unfamiliar longing for connection stay his hand, and the two embark on an odd-couple odyssey that necessarily evolves into a getaway.

title: Haunted House of the Darkness
description: The first, live action, short film made by 6 year old filmmaker, Jett Ufema.

title: Villainy for the Lonely
description: A love triangle between a madman, a serial killer, and a ghost intertwines with the lives of a corrupt cop in search of more power and a hard-boiled vigilante on a self-destructive path of revenge.

title: A Trick
description: Valarie finds herself in the path of a gentleman who is not what he seems.

title: A Dog Thief
description: A dog thief calls his victim for ransom, but gets something more than he asks for.

title: Salvation
description: Detective Dale Boehner (Nick Swagger) is one of the best undercover officers that Lynchbane City has seen in decades. When faced first-hand with the murder of a fellow officer, Samuel Mercer (Cody Brzezinski), Dale must partner with another detective, Leonardo Johnson (Alex Watts). Leo, a goodhearted but by-the-book and tough on criminals detective, must work with Detective Boehner, a quick-tempered alcoholic with a chip on his shoulder. Before they know it, more bodies turn up with clues that suggest more deaths are yet to come. Soon, they find themselves trapped in a race against time in a sick, twisted game as every passing second could mean another victim suffers the horrifying and grisly death at the hands of the murderer. While Leo handles most of the investigating behind the scenes, Dale conducts his own investigation in the field within the corrupt concrete jungle of Lynchbane City. Dale, struggling with his own demons, must work through his troubles that are overshadowing the case while struggling through twists and turns of the winding road of the clever killer's psychological games to capture the murderer and discover the shocking truth in the psychological comedy drama, SALVATION.

title: Poncho's Palace
description: A man discovers that his wife is cheating on him, so he plans to have her murdered.

title: Hernandez
description: He'll do anything for his family, but he won't do that.

title: Memory Field
description: As Kyle, age 18, awakens in the middle of a field, be realizes that it is not just his memory that has been lost, but a past symptom that has returned. He will eventually have to deal with family, and in the end, his own life.

title: Malcolm's (Sixth)
description: Seven dreams. Seven Stories. One soul. Malcolm's time is almost up.

title: Blackbags
description: Things are getting hot for Ski Mask Guy and his gang of masked villains. Too many habits have begun to spiral out of control. If it's not a corrupt police detective breathing down his neck for a fix, he has to try and put a limit on his crony, the Meathead's new hobby: cruising the city streets at night and abducting young girls. But when these two problems collide, Ski Mask Guy must find a way to wrap up these loose ends without going down, himself.

title: Hiding in the Open
description: Raha is curious and innocent teenage girl who wants to capture the world around her with her camera. One day looking through her view finder she sees something that will change how she perceive the world around her.

title: The Ghost Tales
description: Inspired by an ancient Chinese ghost story, the tale that goes beyond what viewers usually expect in the ghost movies and further to challenge the traditional story-telling pattern.

title: The Race of Death
description: Max is in danger from a cult seeking his life. As his friends sit over a beer, they discuss his fate but find its too late - but for who?

title: Killer Morning
description: A father's routine morning of pills and alcohol gets interrupted by his daughter's disappearance.

title: RedneX
description: It's no secret that people from the big city look at northern Florida as a backwaters filled with unpredictable and somewhat scary 'rednecks' packed into beat-up pickups drinking moonshine and waving Confederate flags. That's exactly how a New York modeling agent and his hot new client feel when their car breaks down in the middle of nowhere, miles away from everything but a strange rundown motel and a dive bar ruled by loads of leering locals and a scary alligator hunter, one of the best movie rednecks to hit the screen. While the off-putting antics of the locals at first seems excusable, soon the wild experience takes a scary and sinister turn.

title: The Dying Game
description: Alison wants to audition for a new reality show in New York City called 'THE GAME' against her boyfriend Greg's wishes. She almost auditions until she's spooked by something she over hears another actress say. The next day after further investigation she learns that THE GAME was played in Brazil and the people who played THE GAME all mysteriously died. A friend of Greg's made it to the second round of auditions. Can Alison and Greg save his friend and warn the rest of the people before it's too late?

title: O Bairro
description: Five people have their lives crossed at the place where the law is made by whoever takes the first step.

title: Saboba
description: The Movie is talking about Armed Robbery Crime in a suspense frame of a group of criminals but ended with a disaster.

title: Together
description: A man kidnaps his estranged wife who he hasn't seen for six months since she walked out on him, with the hope of rescuing their relationship.

title: Drowned Out
description: A young man is confronted by his past when he visits his childhood summer house.

title: Stained
description: A man wakes one morning to realize that his reflections on mirror is missing.

title: The Grunts
description: Paul, a former Marine has opened his home to a group of disgruntled runaway boys. Paul has raised them from boys to men, while teaching them the dangerous art of skilled killing. Some of them decided they wanted to go a different route, which means taking Paul out. Cameron, Paul's most loyal take in has vowed to seek revenge towards his once loyal buddies for Paul's death, but first he must track them down. With the love of his girlfriend and guidance of his house buddy mentor, Cameron has a view of a better life beyond his current surroundings, once he realizes that his former housemates have become the problem that Paul was trying to solve

title: Intruder!
description: An intruder's destiny.

title: The Outsourced
description: A group of laid off co-workers plan revenge on their on their ex-boss Frank Frank in turn extracts his own revenge on his ex-employees Revenge is the word for today.

title: The Crucible
description: A group of students prepare for their college workshop play The Crucible. A lead role meets his sudden, doubtful death with little time left for the performance. All the others spur into rehearsals again, ignoring the truth of his uneasy death. Then one day, only the main characters rehearsal until late at night. Theater doors are locked without anyone knowing, and the students disappear one by one. The doubtful death of their friend that had been submerged in students suddenly resurfaces, and they get into uncontrollable confusion.

title: Boxed In
description: Alvarez, a recluse self-storage facility manager with phobias is forced to face his fears in order to save his assistant who is his only friend and connection to the rest of the world.

title: Burying the Truth
description: John has a secret and he's gonna make sure it doesn't get out.

title: Captivity
description: As a spy, Eric has to stay discrete to protect his double identity. Just after discovering who he really was, his fiancée Alexandra dissappeared mysteriously. following the orders, Eric must do everything to find her.

title: The Devil, Walketh About
description: The Devil, Walketh About tells the story of an investigative journalist named Stephanie Jackson, writing a story on the murders of two people at the hands of their own daughter, Jennifer, who claimed to be under the influence of Satan at the time of the murders. As Stephanie gets closer and closer to the truth it seems demonic forces are moving against her. She begins to experience the same horrors and nightmares that Jennifer experienced. Can Stephanie solve the puzzle before her times runs out. She only has six days left...

title: Cataclysm
description: Jack, an estranged man has found himself caught in a predicament, lost in the woods with no clue how he got there.

title: Schemata
description: A group of students begin to uncover how their minds work but as the lessons become more shocking, one begins to lose touch with their's.

title: Dancing Dogs
description: Two estranged sisters, Lily and River, set out to find a beach they remember from their childhood, where they can spread the ashes of their dead sister, fulfilling her final request. With the beach almost at hand, they are kidnapped by a delusional ballet teacher Elizaveta, forcing them to train in a desperate attempt to accomplish her own withered dream. As the show draws closer, the sisters are driven to their physical and mental limits. Their only hope for survival is to put their past behind them and work together.

title: Squatch! Curse of the Tree Guardian
description: A Squatch,a sleepy Oregon town and greedy townsfolk make for a bad combination.

title: Psychesthenia
description: Three friends. A farewell dinner. And no idea that their goodbyes were forever. One by one, their lives are turned upside down. The world as they knew it is stripped away as their perception of reality begins to warp. The difference between sanity and madness is only a matter of perspective.

title: Dial 'F'...
description: When Dave arrives home one evening after a long at work, a string of spooky events around the house lead him to believe that his feeling of impending doom cannot simply be coincidence. After calming himself down, his evening takes a deadly turn, leaving Dave filled with fear, confusion and regret.

title: Sounds Like Murder
description: A down on his luck foley artist is driven to desperate measures to insure the integrity of his art.

title: A Little Off the Top
description: A hair stylist and his long lost, famous client reunite for a styling session down memory lane with unpleasant consequences for one of them.

title: Shirshendu's Diary
description: The decline of the 34 yrs domination of the Communist party in West Bengal was shortly preceded by an intolerable political turmoil, to which a famous Theatre and Film director Shirshendu Ray falls victim. The political turmoil still continues with hundreds of processions on the roads, every day the news reveals the death of an innocent countryman. While Bengal carries on her drastic, horrible daily life, famous director Mr. Ray becomes so depressed that he has to be forcibly taken to a mental asylum. After a long treatment in the mental asylum Mr. Ray becomes stable. But Suddenly one day he goes missing from the asylum.

title: Lights Out Rowan
description: In a modern day fairy tale, Rowan ventures into mysterious darkness that contains dangerous creatures to save her family from the clutches of the evil Dr. Ravenen.

title: Blight
description: A thundering 3 screen experimental response to Dante's Inferno.

title: The Big One
description: The Big One is a film about choices. Everyday we are put in situations and we choose to do good, bad, or something in between. Owen Vestri has always done the right thing. He's a nice guy, hard worker, and dedicated student who wants to win his school's business grant. He loses the grant, then his girlfriend, and suddenly something else is put into limbo: his soul. His mind has had enough of failure. Good guys do not finish first and the darkest part of his subconscious knows this. For a while reason and logic prevail but with another brutal and costly semester on the horizon, the dark side begins to take over. At first it is all fun and games for Owen. He never does anything, he just sets things in motion and things go in his favor. People's funny vices are exposed and Owen's stock rises as others fall. Little by little the consequences become greater and he decides it is time to stop. His mind has other plans and wants to keep playing. Can Owen make things right? Can he succeed in a society that is more about profits than it is principles? What is success? Owen needs to figure it out before he goes crazy and crosses a line he can never return to.

title: Heads and Tales
description: Little Beauty is on her way to visit Grandma, when a coin-flipper young man approaches her at the airport. How does this classic fairy tale end?

title: Ambassador Spock
description: An internet troll leaves a bad comment on Sam and Peter's YouTube video, and they have one thing on their mind - finding this person and making them pay for unsubscribing to their channel.

title: Run
description: A seven year old boy is shaken after witnessing the grisly aftermath of an act of panic, causing him to flee from his family home one Saturday afternoon. The effects of this event run into his adult life as we find him fleeing yet again, this time for more ominous reasons, with his reactions coming full circle.

title: Nekropolis
description: For the dead and the living, David Hazzard has to bear witness. For these are the last days for humankind. And Hazzard has but two companions who might or might not be the last men on Earth.

title: The Dolchemock Tapes
description: A found-footage style dark comedy about a dysfunctional group that treks into the mysterious Dolchemock Forest to investigate rumors of strange happenings, and end up getting much more than they bargained for.

title: Sunday Night
description: A student is plagued with a terrifying nightmare after procrastinating on his homework.

title: Darling Pet Munkee Presents: Creature Double Feature
description: "Darling Pet Munkee Presents: Creature Double Feature" is a 2012 direct-to-DVD hosted horror movie with Porcelain Dalya as horror host "Dalya, Mistress of the Munkee".

title: La Dama Blanca
description: Tommy, (Adrian Moure) a 22 year-old spanish man wakes up in his room, starts his daily routine and minutes later he receives an unexpected visit in his lonely residence; things take a different turn, leading down the road of the unexpected. A world that's known to him starts falling apart.

title: Study
description: A psychology student tries to study surrounded by his past and his present, obsessed by the concept of life and death, and tortured by the eternal struggle between science and religion.

title: The Housesitter
description: For more than a century an elite secret society from a prestigious New England university has engaged in a macabre rite of passage. Now, a rival they did not know they had has sent a killer into their midst for retribution. For Susan and her friends this was meant to be a fun weekend, taking advantage of her job house sitting for a professor. However they soon find themselves hunted for sport, pawns in a contest they know nothing about, and Susan will find that she's fighting for more than her life.

title: Death Canyon
description: Six friends bring video cameras with them on a camping trip near an old ghost town in Death Canyon, Utah. They go there expecting to have fun and look for gold in the abandoned mines. Instead of finding gold, they find something they never wanted. Something that they will not escape.

title: La mala luz
description: In an attempt to solve their marriage problems, Eric and Mari take a road trip through the jungles of the Mexican southeast, but she disappears under mysterious circumstances. On his way back to Mexico City, Eric meets Narciso, a mysterious man, and gives him a ride. While traveling together, Narciso encourages Eric to tell him about the strange circumstances surrounding his wife's disappearance. Eric describes a series of weird events which finally lead him to a devastating revelation about the time he shared with Mari.

title: Fool's Gold
description: When keen metal detector Derek inadvertently stumbles onto a rivals patch. He digs up more than he can shovel.

title: Tormented
description: Supernatural obsession.

title: The Man-Hunt
description: This new tale of suspense continues following Peter Heading, the cop from "The Kidnapping" who swore to take down The Hit Man. In the final of three films by writer/director Ryan Konig, it has been three months since Officer Peter Heading watched The Hit Man drive away after escaping capture. The Hit Man, played now for the third time by Andrew Lembeck-Edens, has been staying off the grid with the hope that Officer Heading might give up the man-hunt. Unfortunately for The Hit Man, Heading is stubborn, and will go to any lengths to track him down. Still, as much as The Hit Man wants to stop hiding, he hasn't quite shaken the rush of facing off against Heading, one of the few adversaries who's given him a run for his money. Knowing he won the first round, The Hit Man stalks Heading in a sick hope that one day Heading WILL find him, and they can go for round two. But as Heading and The Hit Man trade blows once again, their lives may not be the only ones at risk.

title: The Green Gaze
description: Rose (Katharina Sellner) has been looking forward to her birthday for ages. But when she goes out for some birthday drinks with her friend, they bump into two mysterious strangers, and soon they are left running for their lives. Will their friends save them before it is too late? Or will the green gaze descend upon them all? The raven is calling and the hunt has begun...
